events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but would like to initiate a refund because it doesn't fit as expected and I want to return it.
The system has identified the request as a refund inquiry based on the customer's message about returning an item for money back.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket due to sizing issues.

Just checking in to confirm if you were able to send back the jacket and if everything is proceeding smoothly with your refund.
Yes, I sent the jacket back two days ago via the prepaid label and look forward to receiving my refund soon.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund today. The amount should reflect on your account within 3-5 business days.
We value your feedback. Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your refund and overall customer service experience.
